title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
In a separate pan, cook pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Set aside.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, Pecorino, Parmesan, and a good amount of black pepper.
Drain spaghetti, reserving a little pasta water.
Add spaghetti to the pancetta pan, remove from heat, and quickly mix in the egg-cheese mixture.
Add reserved pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, paprika, turmeric, garam masala, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked through, then set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger; cook for 1 minute.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Pour in cream, mix well, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add grilled chicken and cook for another 5–10 minutes, allowing flavors to blend.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan bread.
